title: 03/23/22: Notice to Jean Coutu Pharmacies using Sage
content: Dear clients, Please note that as of 04/16/22 (for Quebec) and 06/11/22 (for Ontario); the Centre RX will be implementing a new communication protocol between Punches and Sage that will replace the existing protocol.In order to ensure the transfer of your employees' payroll, once in the "Pay > Exportation" menu, simply use the "Generate and Send" button. Rest assured, our development team is currently working on a solution to adapt to these changes.Hoping that this change will not affect your interest in Emprez/Horarius software, and remaining at your disposal for any question or request for clarification, please accept, Madam, Sir, the assurance of our consideration. The Emprez TeamHelpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
